ultra_list.name: Restoration Ring
ultra_list.description: It restores 50 points of your fatigue and boosts your defense by 50% for 40 seconds.

ultra_list.name: Gobattle Ring
ultra_list.description: Increases 50% of your attack, defense, speed, and jump for 30 seconds. Gives Invincibility for 30 seconds.

ultra_list.name: Firebreath Ring
ultra_list.description: Invokes a fire attack, ring has 10 uses. The attack varies by the users attack. Sometimes, it will work with blue ring.

ultra_list.name: Blue Ring
ultra_list.description: Increases your power attack 3x for 30 seconds

ultra_list.name: Red Ring
ultra_list.description: Regenerates your health 8 times faster for 1 minute

ultra_list.name: Bloodmoon Ring
ultra_list.description: A mystical ring that, when activated, conjures four fearsome bats with crimson eyes, serving as loyal companions and formidable allies under the blood moon's eerie light.

ultra_list.name: Anti Freezing Glove
ultra_list.description: Freeze protection for 60 seconds, your speed decreases 20%

ultra_list.name: Instant Strength Glove
ultra_list.description: Increases your power attack 20% during 40 seconds, your defense decreases 20%

ultra_list.name: Epic Strength Glove
ultra_list.description: Increases your power attack 50% during 40 seconds, your defense decreases 30%

ultra_list.name: Gravity Feather
ultra_list.description: Your gravity decreases 50% during 30 seconds, your defense decreases 20%

ultra_list.name: Team Gravity Feather
ultra_list.description: For a duration of 40 seconds, the gravity affecting both you and your group members will decrease by 50%. Additionally, your attack with increase by 20%.

ultra_list.name: Hermes Boots
ultra_list.description: Increases your speed 50% for 40 seconds

ultra_list.name: Speed Boots
ultra_list.description: Increases speed 20%, your defense decreases 20%

ultra_list.name: Maximum Speed Boots
ultra_list.description: Increases speed 75% during 40 seconds, your defense decreases 30%

ultra_list.name: Normal Invisibility Cloak
ultra_list.description: Makes you invisible for 20 seconds

ultra_list.name: Extreme Invisibility Cloak
ultra_list.description: Makes you invisible for 60 seconds, decreases your attack 20%

ultra_list.name: Instant Defense Cloak
ultra_list.description: Increases your defense 50% during 40 seconds, your power attack decreases 20%

ultra_list.name: Epic Instant Defense Cloak
ultra_list.description: Increases defense by 80%, attack decreases 40%.

ultra_list.name: Normal Health Regeneration Cloak
ultra_list.description: Regenerates health points 200% faster during 40

ultra_list.name: Maximum Health Regeneration Cloak
ultra_list.description: Regenerates health points 400% faster during 60 seconds, your power attack decreases 20%

ultra_list.name: Normal Venom Protection Cloak
ultra_list.description: Protects you from venom during 40 seconds

ultra_list.name: Extreme Venom Protection Cloak
ultra_list.description: Protects you from venom during 60 seconds, your power attack decreases 20%

ultra_list.name: Maximum Fire Protection Cloak
ultra_list.description: Protects you from fire during 60 seconds.

ultra_list.name: Fire Protection Cloak
ultra_list.description: It protects you from fire during 30 seconds.

ultra_list.name: Breath Helmet
ultra_list.description: You can breathe underwater 4x the initial time (40 seconds total)

ultra_list.name: Lava Armor Protector
ultra_list.description: Protects you from lava damage during 60 seconds, decreases 20% of your velocity.

ultra_list.name: Anti Fire Enchantment
ultra_list.description: Stops fire on people around you and yourself, not repairable

ultra_list.name: Epic Invicibility Potion
ultra_list.description: Makes you invincible (you don't take damage besides from debuffs) for 40 seconds

ultra_list.name: Firebreath's Blood
ultra_list.description: Invokes fire attack. Not repairable, one use.

ultra_list.name: Special Halloween Broom
ultra_list.description: You can use this broom to fly for 10 minutes. Linked to Halloween World. If you dismount or you leave Halloween world, the object will disappear.

ultra_list.name: Sleigh Enchantment
ultra_list.description: This enchantment invokes a flying sleigh that you can use as a mount for 10 minutes. You cannot use this object inside a dungeon. Bound object.

ultra_list.name: Special Christmas Hat
ultra_list.description: You can use this hat to fly with a sleigh like Santa for 10 minutes. This object is linked to Winter Wonderland. If you dismount or you leave Winterland, it will disappear.

ultra_list.name: Peppermint Strike
ultra_list.description: Unleash the Peppermint Strike, a sweet and powerful attack that swirls through adversaries with the refreshing force of a candy cane breeze.

ultra_list.name: Dice of Destiny
ultra_list.description: Increases your luck 1%

ultra_list.name: Iron Heart
ultra_list.description: Increases max health 2%

ultra_list.name: Rejuvenation Gem
ultra_list.description: Increases regeneration 2%

ultra_list.name: Inferno Touch
ultra_list.description: 1% chance of burning effect (PVP)

ultra_list.name: Greed's Grip
ultra_list.description: Attract coins close to you

ultra_list.name: Dwarf's Strength
ultra_list.description: Increases reach of Axes 8%

ultra_list.name: Flying Skill
ultra_list.description: Gives you the skill to dash vertically with your wings

ultra_list.name: Dodge Charm
ultra_list.description: 1% chance of dodging any attack

ultra_list.name: Gem Dust
ultra_list.description: Up to 5 dyams (+ Luck) per gem in chests
